column1: [HIGHLIGHT] Juancho Hernangomez putting on a post clinic in the paint to get his 25th points of the night.
Juancho Hernangomez has 19/3/2/2/1 on 78% shooting..
[HIGHLIGHTS] Juancho Hernangomez explodes for 25 points, 8 Rebs, 2 Asts, and 5/8 from THREE, in lost to Denver Nuggets.

[Scotto] As the Timberwolves have begun to play more of their young players, Minnesota has received calls from teams on several of their veterans, including Ed Davis, Ricky Rubio, Juancho Hernangomez and Jake Layman, HoopsHype has learned.
[Moore] Anthony Edwards says he's going to Spain with Ricky Rubio and Juancho Hernangomez this summer. Says he's gonna learn fluent spanish so he knows what those two are talkin about all the time.

[Moore] Naz Reid, Anthony Edwards and Juancho Hernangomez have all gotten hurt in the lead up to the Olympics, training with their national teams. Hernangomez is the only one of the three whose injury is expected to be serious.

[Krawczynski] Team Spain says they had the go-ahead from the Wolves to bring Juancho Hernangomez to the Olympics. The Wolves say they never gave medical clearance to him. Either way, Hernangomez is upset with the decision and there is some damage control ahead
The Memphis Grizzlies are trading Patrick Beverley to the Minnesota Timberwolves for Jarrett Culver and Juancho Hernangomez, sources tell ESPN.

[Wojnarowski] Memphis has agreed to trade forward Juancho Hernangomez to Boston for guards Kris Dunn, Carsen Edwards and a 2026 second-round pick swap, sources tell ESPN.

[Marks] Juancho Hernangomez was not asked to report nor take a physical after the trade to Memphis. That’s a sign that the tenure for that player is short.

[Weiss] Celtics announce details of pick swap in Juancho Hernangomez for Carsen Edwards and Kris Dunn trade: Memphis will own the right to swap a 2026 second round draft pick (the better of Miami’s or Dallas’) with Boston’s 2026 second round draft pick.
